Address.Address1: PT212695B, JALAN MEDAN IPOH 1A, MEDAN IPOH BISTARI

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at MH Hotel Ipoh in Ipoh, you'll be convenient to Perak Stadium and Sultan Abdul Aziz Recreation Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Gunung Lang Recreational Park and Perak Cave.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of MH Hotel Ipoh. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and laundry facilities. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of MH Hotel Ipoh. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Perak Stadium - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Sultan Abdul Aziz Recreation Park - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Gunung Lang Recreational Park - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Perak Cave - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Royal Perak Golf Club - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Parkson Ipoh Parade Mall - 4 km / 2.5 mi
D. R. Seenivasagam Park - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Sam Poh Tong Temple - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Mari Amman Temple - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Kek Lok Tong - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Kellie's Castle - 16.6 km / 10.3 mi

The preferred airport for MH Hotel Ipoh is Ipoh (IPH-Sultan Azlan Shah) - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
